name: Multiplayer 3D Monster Maze
description:
You and up to 3 other players must find the key and then the exit, all the while avoid the T-Rex that roams the maze.  The first player to get through the exit is the winner.

Controls:-

Keyboard and/or gamepads.

Source code available at https://github.com/SteveSmith16384/splitscreenfps_libgdx
